dialogStrings: Costa del Sol Inn

“Uggh! I feel God awful!
Oh!! You!”{PAUSE}“Weren't you with
that big sailor?”
{CHOICE}Dunno what you're talking about
{CHOICE}Wasn't me

{Cloud}
“What's the matter?”

{Cloud}
“I don't know.”

“Wrong guy?
This is bad for us.
That guy's taken over the john.”{PAUSE}“And he hasn't even paid his hotel bill yet.”

“Listen to this…”{PAUSE}“A big sailor just
busted in here all of a sudden,
and took over the restroom.”{PAUSE}“He's been in there moaning ever since.”{PAUSE}“I don't know what I'm gonna do.”

“Ah…if you're checking in,
would you please pay his bill, too?”

“Come now, we know
he's a friend of yours…(fibber)”{PAUSE}“What now? Call it a night?”{PAUSE}“200 gil a night.”

{CHOICE}Stay

“Cradled by the sound of the ocean…
sweet dreams…”

“Are you sure?
Please come again.”

“Shucks!! Too bad!”{PAUSE}“Hey! Hey you!
Does your friend have a cute lady?”{PAUSE}“She came in here looking for him a while ago.
You better find her.”

“What are you going to do?
Just forget about her and go to bed?”{PAUSE}“200 gil a night.”

{Barret}
“Uh uh!”

“Hmmm!?”

“Marlene!
You OK?”

{Barret}
“I'll wear this when I go to see you.”

{Barret}
“Yo, {Cloud}!
Still too early, ain't it?”

{Barret}
“Hey, yo!!!
Someone's in here, alright!?”

{Aeris}
“Whew…
I don't know why I'm so tired.”{PAUSE}“There's so many things I don't understand…”
“I feel a little uneasy.”

{Aeris}
“{Cloud}…?”{PAUSE}“What do you think of me?”
{CHOICE}I dunno
{CHOICE}Nothing much

{Cloud}
“I don't understand anything.”

{Cloud}
“Sorry,
but I never think about those things.”

{Aeris}
“How could you say such a thing!
Sometimes you make me so mad!”{PAUSE}“Oh, I never should have brought it up!!”

{Aeris}
“…You're right.”{PAUSE}“Even I don't understand myself.”

“I wonder what part of me is like an Ancient?”{PAUSE}“What is an Ancient supposed to be like?
It's strange, isn't it?”{PAUSE}“I don't understand it…”

“Ahh…I'm going around in circles.
I wonder if there's any answer to this?
Everything's so complicated.”

{Aeris}
“I'm going to sleep.”

{Aeris}
“I don't want to talk about it!”
